body_html:
v2 is the wrong word, but this param is helpful to have and gives the needed behavior for users.
The param has to be changed to: scale_train=True, and scale_train=False enables the v1 behavior.

v2 is the wrong word, but this param is helpful to have and gives the needed behavior for users.
The param has to be changed to: scale_train=True, and scale_train=False enables the v1 behavior.
body:
v2 is the wrong word, but this param is helpful to have and gives the needed behavior for users.
The param has to be changed to: scale_train=True, and scale_train=False enables the v1 behavior.
